name: read_file
description: Read the contents of a file. Output includes line numbers formatted as `{line_number} | {content}`. Use offset and limit to read specific portions of large files.

file_path.description: Absolute path to the file to read.

offset.description: Line number to start reading from (1-based). Defaults to 1.

limit.description: Maximum number of lines to read. Defaults to 2000.
